column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////One of the most perfect dining experiences I've ever had. My husband and I had reservations
column2: but we arrived early to have a drink at the bar. It took a hot minute for our eyes to adjust to the darkness of the restaurant. Once they did
column3: I was taken aback by the absolute gorgeousness of the restaurant. I cannot even put it into words
column4: I could have stayed there all night just taking everything in. We grabbed a spot at the bar
column5: the bartenders were very nice and attentive.
